fullDescription.intro: Adds a default time zone to those cells which do have only date and time yet or changes an already existing time zone.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only to the included columns a date will be added.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new ones.

tab.name: Time Zone Selection
tab.option: A time zone can be chosen.

ports.outPort: Output table with added or changed time zone.
